meanings.definition: Slow-moving mammals known for hanging upside down in trees.
meanings.sent1: Sloths are animals that move very slowly in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a documentary about sloths living in the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The sloths in the zoo seemed to be enjoying their lazy day.
meanings.sent4: Her relaxed demeanor reminded me of the sloths hanging in the trees.
meanings.sent5: The adorable sloths with their slow movements captured everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: His constant procrastination showed a hint of sloths in his behavior.
meanings.sent2: The manager was frustrated with the team's sloths during the project.
meanings.sent3: Despite his sloths, he managed to finish the assignment on time.
meanings.sent4: The sloths of the office were evident during the busy season.
meanings.sent5: Overcoming sloths is essential to achieving success in life.
